snippet: The chief of the Australian team coordinating the search for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 said Monday that it had detected “transmissions consistent with” flight recorders, possibly from the missing jet.
abstract: Chief of Australian team coordinating search for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 says it has detected 'transmissions consistent with' flight recorders, possibly from the missing jet.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Chris Buckley from Hong Kong; Nicola Clark from Paris; Michelle Innis from Sydney, Australia; and Matthew L. Wald from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The chief of the Australian team coordinating the search for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 said Monday that it had detected “transmissions consistent with” flight recorders, possibly from the missing jet.

headline.main: Search Crews Detect Signals They Say May Be From Missing Malaysian Jet
headline.print_headline: Search Crews Detect Signals They Say May Be From Missing Malaysian Jet
